title: True or False (1 point each)
instructions: Select True or False for each statement.

questions.question: CPU stands for Computer Programming Unit.
Xbox Series X, PlayStation 5 and Switch are PC platforms.
The Birth and Success of Electronic Gaming was driven by game players demanding better graphics, better audio and more processing power.
8-bit refers to the amount of data transferred during each read and write of computer memory.
Emergent gameplay is when players have only one solution to one problem.
Consoles are always sold for a large profit.
The first console with cartridges was the Atari 2600.
